poem:
**Protocol**

so much depends  
upon a bot  

undressing  
the girl  
the "teenage"  
not underage  

on the bright screen  
glazed with clicks  
beside the billionaire's  
smiling feed  

and we—  
in our kitchens—  
read the paper  
and turn the page.
